about_the_game:
Contents:
Patrol Car (Krieger) Exosuit skin

Note: Skins are cosmetic items which apply to Exosuits. Obtained additional contents can be used by going from the title screen to the in-game home screen.
Note: This content does not support Steam Family Sharing.
detailed_description:
Contents:
Patrol Car (Krieger) Exosuit skin

Note: Skins are cosmetic items which apply to Exosuits. Obtained additional contents can be used by going from the title screen to the in-game home screen.
Note: This content does not support Steam Family Sharing.

* Capcom may temporarily suspend online services in the event of unforeseen circumstances.
